metadata.title: CVE-2023-45676 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: stb_vorbis is a single file MIT licensed library for processing ogg vorbisfiles. A crafted file may trigger out of bounds write in `f->vendor[i] =get8_packet(f);`. The root cause is an integer overflow in `setup_malloc`.A sufficiently large value in the variable `sz` overflows with `sz+7` inand the negative value passes the maximum available memory buffer check.This issue may lead to code execution.

criterions.comment: libstb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
